column4: i've always thought checknstall is more trouble than its worth. i always end up with problems with the update manager wondering why theres a newer version in the db
If there is a package, doing a backport or custom package is a better bet anyway.
Of course, if you give the package a different name, such problems do not occur.
yeah, i just had a bad experience with trying to install gaim beta5 on edgy. the update manager freaked out for some reason
